message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. This is a great opportunity to get your hands on a high-quality product at a competitive price.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality of the product, $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for it. Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $12,000 might be a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11,000. This is a great compromise that still reflects the value of the product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $11,000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm sticking to my previous offer of $9,500. It's a fair price considering the value I place on the product.
